Wow, been a while since I posted with this one.

::Crater::

The organic pods that crater had fired earlier erupt out of the ground
around Injector, releasing vines and trying to trap the NDE member.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Crater/Neody::
> 
> Crater nods. "Allright, that works."
> 
> He runs forward, two blobs seperating from his shoulders and diving
> into the ground. They dig down, heading for an enemy while he pulls
> out his rifle and fires twice at Injector.
